title: Fancy Fanart For RP

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I need 5 RP in order to buy Program Soraka, so I created this little fanart of Kassadin teaching players about the good old days of league ^^
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Aw, what a great history indeed.  Thanks for the drawing!  Share it with us on [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport)or through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see what we can do!
